title: Jackie Collins Dead at Age 77: Joan Collins Shares Moving Photo Tribute to Her "Beautiful Brave Baby Sister"
content:
Jackie Collins Dead at Age 77: Joan Collins Shares Moving Photo Tribute to Her "Beautiful Brave Baby Sister" September 20, 2015No Comments Joan Collins took to Twitter late on Saturday to paid a special tribute to her sister, Jackie Collins.
The famed New York Times-bestselling London-born romance novelist died that day at…
